author: Charlie Campbell / Shanghai and Amy Gunia / Hong Kong
title: China Says It’s Beating Coronavirus. But Can We Believe Its Numbers?
description: If you believe the Chinese authorities, the country’s battle against the novel coronavirus is all but won. But that claim is clouded by a fog of skewed data, political imperatives—and unreported cases and possibly deaths. After several days of trumpeting just…
content:
If you believe the Chinese authorities, the country’s battle against the novel coronavirus is all but won. But that claim is clouded by a fog of skewed data, political imperatives—and unreported cases and possibly deaths.
